summary_detail.value: The Beaverhead-Deerlodge National Forest will Facebook Live stream tonight's community meeting for the Sapphire Complex and the Meyers Fire. The meeting is at Granite County High School, Philipsburg, at 5:30 p.m. See their feed at

title: Livestream of today's public meeting (Sapphire Complex Wildfire)
